jobContext: GCEI is one of the leading educational consultancy firms in Bangladesh serving since 2017 of excellence in services and trust. The responsibilities of the Sr. Officer/Officer will process the visa applications, maintain affiliation with stakeholders, keep track of new and updated knowledge of the specific country and their visa requirements, and deliver assigned tasks timely. The job also includes supporting the emotional and professional growth of applicants, developing and monitoring counseling support programs, and providing educational and vocational guidance.To complete the process successfully, you should treat each individual with patience and compassion for the challenges they are facing. jobDescription: GCEI is one of the leading educational consultancy firms in Bangladesh serving since 2017 of excellence in services and trust. We are looking for dynamic and motivated individuals to join our team.

jobTitle: Market Research & Analytics Deputy Manager/ Manager
jobContext:
Design and execute comprehensive market research initiatives, including competitor analysis, customer segmentation, trend forecasting, and demand analysis.
Lead, mentor, and manage a team of market researchers and analysts also measuring their performance
Utilize various research methodologies, both qualitative and quantitative, to gather actionable insights and present findings
Collaborate cross-functionally with product development, marketing, sales, and other teams to align research findings with business objectives and product strategies.
Monitor industry trends, technological advancements, and competitive scenery to identify potential opportunities and threats.
Drive the development of innovative price concepts by applying insights from market research, ensuring alignment with customer preferences and needs.
Analyze the effectiveness of marketing, communication programs, and strategies
Improve existing business case methods or develop new concepts and their formulation
Stay up-to-date with emerging research methodologies, tools, and technologies to continuously improve the effectiveness and efficiency of the market research process.
Conducting in-depth market analysis, identifying emerging trends, and explaining insights into actionable strategies
Analyzing "New products" for marketing to target customers and formulate new budgets
Prepare and present regular reports and presentations to top management, summarizing key findings, recommendations, and potential market entry strategies.
jobDescription: Design and execute comprehensive market research initiatives, including competitor analysis, customer segmentation, trend forecasting, and demand analysis.
educationalReq: Master of Business Administration (MBA) in Finance, Marketing, Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in Finance, Marketing

jobContext:
Oxfam is a global movement of people working together to end the injustice of poverty.
Do you have at least 2-5 years of full-time reporting experience in mainstreamed Daily
Newspapers, Television Channels and Online Media Portals?
Do you have working knowledge on Renewable Energy/Sustainable Environment/Climate Change?
If the answer is yes, then we would like to hear from you!
About the Fellowship:
Although climate justice issues are widely discussed in the Bangladeshi media still there are some areas where journalism has space to be critical, particularly in the inequality and justice part of the climate action. Oxfam believes there is a lot of injustice inside the conventional climate action works where media can play a catalyst role to change the public narrative. The Renewable energy transition is a classic example of the Bangladesh case where most of the spotlight is on technology transformation ignoring the rights prospects of the vulnerable groups.
The fellowship will be awarded to five (5) journalists from (02 National Newspapers, 02 from National Television Channels and 01 from Online News Portals) aiming to get more visibility in terms of the wide range of audiences including policymakers, owner groups, workers and other relevant stakeholders. Selected Journalists will be given necessary trainings, mentorship sessions, relevant data and other supports.
jobDescription: Oxfam is a global movement of people working together to end the injustice of poverty.

jobContext:
Established in 2012, EDOTCO Group is the first regional and integrated telecommunications infrastructure services company in Asia, providing end-to-end solutions in the tower services sector from tower leasing, colocations, build-to-suit, energy, transmission and operations and maintenance (O&M).
EDOTCO Group operates and manages a regional portfolio of over 54,000 towers across Malaysia, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Cambodia, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Philippines, Myanmar, and Laos.
EDOTCO strives to deliver outstanding performance in telecommunications infrastructure services and solutions. Its state-of-the-art real-time monitoring service, echo, has driven significant improvements in field operations while maximizing operational efficiencies in terms of battery, energy, and fuel consumption for telecommunications infrastructure.
Through our operations in developing Asian economies, the Group has established a strong track record in nation building. EDOTCO has progressively invested in industry best practices, providing a broad portfolio of infrastructure solutions, and offering value-added services to enhance efficiencies and connectivity for communities.
We are presently in search of a dynamic individual with leadership potential to fill the following role within the Engineering Division at EDOTCO Bangladesh Co Ltd.
This role involves implementing effective project management, customizing processes for clients, developing governance frameworks, creating product development strategies, improving operations, coordinating landbank creation and sales, approaching new market segments, working on process flow and partnerships, developing business models, showcasing offerings, collaborating with regulators, enhancing reporting tools, and improving tracking mechanisms.
jobDescription: Established in 2012, EDOTCO Group is the first regional and integrated telecommunications infrastructure services company in Asia, providing end-to-end solutions in the tower services sector from tower leasing, colocations, build-to-suit, energy, transmission and operations and maintenance (O&M).
educationalReq: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Civil/ Electrical and Electronics Engineering, or a related field from reputed local/foreign university.
